Package com.myronmarston.music.settings

Class Summary
AbstractVoiceOrSection<M extends AbstractVoiceOrSection,O extends AbstractVoiceOrSection> An abstract class containing a common interface and common logic shared by the Voice and Section classes.
FractalPiece The GrandDaddy of them all.
Section The entire fractal piece is composed of a series of sections.
SelfSimilaritySettings Specifies settings for what to apply self-similarity to.
TimeSignature Class that holds the time signature for the fractal piece.
Voice A FractalPiece is composed of several voices.
VoiceOrSectionList<M extends AbstractVoiceOrSection,O extends AbstractVoiceOrSection> List of Voices or Sections that manages the creation and deletion of the VoiceSection objects as necessitated by add() and remove().
VoiceSection Represents the smallest unit of the fractal piece for which the user can specify settings.
VoiceSectionHashMapKey Used as a hash key to access a particular VoiceSection.
VoiceSectionList An instance of this contains a subset of all the VoiceSections of the entire fractal piece.
 

Exception Summary
InvalidTimeSignatureException Exception that is thrown when an invalid time signature is created.
NonPositiveTimeSignatureException Exception that is thrown when a time signature is given a negative or zero numerator or denominator.
TimeSignatureDenominatorNotAPowerOf2Exception Exception that is thrown when the time signature denominator is not a power of 2.
